summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 9.7°C) and outside temperature (down 9.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 306 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 22 miles) and cloud levels (up 194 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 306.1m lower than yesterday, 194.5m lower than past week, 194.3m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 425m minimum and 1526m maximum, with an average of 646.9m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 841.4m and 841.2m.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; chilly temperatures are forecasted. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and mostly calm with light air movement. Showers, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and it’s dark. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
